name: Introduction to Neuroscience
description: An introductory course on the fundamentals of neuroscience, covering topics from the cellular level to behavior.

name: Neuroanatomy
description: A course on the structure and function of the nervous system, focusing on the brain and its components.

name: Neurophysiology
description: A course on the electrical, chemical, and biological properties of neurons and their role in the nervous system.

name: Cellular Neuroscience
description: A course on the molecular and cellular mechanisms of neurons, including ion channels and synaptic transmission.
